Text: RE Houston Beta Kappa Distinguished Speaker SeriesI will attend Im putting the finishing touches on the Powerpoint presentation as we speak Just make sure you brush up on offbalance sheet financing and limited partnerships DG Original Message From ENRON Sent Monday October AM To Subject Houston Beta Kappa Distinguished Speaker Series Gentlemen The Houston Beta Kappa Distinguished Speaker Series will continue tomorrow October at PM at Zydecos in the Bank One Building Our guest speaker will be Darron Giron His topic will be How to really fuck up a good company in a hurry aka The Enron Story Please let me know if you can attend Schroeder
